meanings.definition: Of or relating to equal dimensions or measurements.
meanings.sent1: The two sides of the square are isometric, meaning they have the same length.
meanings.sent2: The architect used isometric drawings to show the building's dimensions accurately.
meanings.sent3: The isometric puzzle pieces fit perfectly together, creating a harmonious design.
meanings.sent4: Her isometric approach to problem-solving ensured all sides were balanced and equal.
meanings.sent5: The isometric relationship between the width and height of the room made it feel spacious.

meanings.definition: A method of physical exercise in which one set of muscles is worked against another set of muscles or a stationary object.
meanings.sent1: She incorporated isometric exercises into her workout routine to strengthen her muscles.
meanings.sent2: The trainer demonstrated various isometric poses to improve muscle tone.
meanings.sent3: During the fitness class, they had a friendly competition to see who could hold the isometric position the longest.
meanings.sent4: The isometric workout felt like a silent battle between different muscle groups.
meanings.sent5: The isometric exercise equipment provided resistance for a challenging workout.
